thread.title: Funding Planned Parenthood
thread.title_full: Funding Planned Parenthood - The Washington Post

author: washingtonpost.com
title: Funding Planned Parenthood
text:
People participate in a rally to show support for Planned Parenthood, organized by MoveOn and called Pink Out Kansas City, at Country Club Plaza, last month in Kansas City, Mo. (John Sleezer/The Kansas City Star via Associated Press) October 5 at 7:27 PM Regarding the Sept. 30 front-page article “ A vigorous defense of Planned Parenthood ”:
Full disclosure, please. Regarding those who would vote to defund Planned Parenthood, how many of them have adopted a child that would have otherwise been aborted? How many children do they have? How many have had a vasectomy? How many wives or mistresses have had sterilizations?
Perhaps only women should be allowed to vote on this decision. If men could become pregnant, abortion would be a sacrament! Nothing in the Bible discusses this issue.
E.E. Notar , Lewes, Del.
●
The article “ A vigorous defense of Planned Parenthood ” made very clear that there is no defense for what Planned Parenthood does.
Planned Parenthood kills more than 300,000 human beings every year through abortions and has killed more than 5 million in this country since 1970 . No moral defense exists for the destruction of human life on this scale. Killing human beings at any stage of our lives violates our rights and is therefore, by definition, a crime.
Joe Armour , Annandale
